Room.Name: Storage Closet
Room.ShortDescription: This is a storage room where customers keep their valuables while visiting.
Room.LongDescription: Madame Ruthie has a rule that the only way you can leave this room is totally naked, prepared for a little action. Her motto is keep 'em moving. There are a number of valuable pieces of armor and weapons in here, but it would probably make someone mad if you took what isn't yours. When he remembers to do it, a drunken old dwarf will retrieve your clothes and armor for you, and return them to you when you leave, if you have paid your bill.
